caption.p: E. coli counts after incubation with M41–EOC–Z systems (M41-Thy-Z ( a), M41–Car–Z ( b) and M41–Cin–Z ( c)) and free EOCs (thymol ( d), carvacrol ( e) and cinnamaldehyde ( f)) according to particle and EOC concentration. Red dots mark the coincidental concentrations between the encapsulated EOC and the free molecule. Antimicrobial assays were performed in triplicate, and error bars correspond to the standard deviation.
